self.description: Canonical link to the current resource

next.description: Canonical address to the next page in a list

Article.description: An article. A collection of resources written by an editor in The CMS

sponsor.description: Human readable string of the article's sponsor

logo.description: Url with the company short symbol.

label.description: Passion campaign label (e.g. Anons fr√•n CompanyName).

is_premium.description: Whether the article is premium or not.

ArticleCarousel.description: Carousel containing a bunch of articles. TBD if it could contain other Group types

CategoryHeading.description: Heading for a group of categories. Check category.feature_category for if it should show a toggle.

CategoryLink.description: Link for a group of categories.

PromoteBox.description: A box for promoting content from another app.

link.description: The uri for opening the other app, if installed.

StoryHeading.description: Heading for a group based on story.

StoryLink.description: Link for a group based on story.

Ticker.description: A ticker usually containing two items for wich an app may subscribe to real time updates.

display_name.description: Name to show to the user.

item_sector.description: Id used when fetching data from the stocks data api.

TopicBox.description: The TopicBox contains articles related to the topic

topic_box_id.description: References the user settings field where the topic is stored

articles.description: References the list of articles related to the topic

Variants.description: Variants of components to be shown depeneding on the choice of option for given selection. The choice is supposedly provided by external service.

Webview.description: Web content loaded from a url, or use content property

content.description: Html to put directly into a webview

NewsfeedAdPlaceholder.description: Placeholder used to define a placement for content display ad

BoxHeading.description: Lead resource used for themed boxes

BoxButton.description: Box button used to redirect user to the themed box's category

Box.description: Box component used to present special content.

subtype.description: Subtype defines subject of usage the resource

Carousel.description: A carousel of articles in a topic

watermark.description: Optional watermark for image, an url to semi-transparent image to lay over the original one.

title.description: Name of an author, might be undefined when newsroom is a news agency

newsroom.description: Authors newsroom or name of news agency. If undefined use the default newsroom defined in the app

fallback_email.description: Provided if the newsroom does not want to use personal emails or if personal email is missing

hide_in_teaser.description: When true, the main_text resource should not be displayed in teasers.

StoryVignette.description: Similar to a Text.vignette, but separate

ref.description: If and what kind of link the vignette may have

id.description: The reference id. Set if ref is story or category.

EvergreenArticleLink.description: A link linking to an evergreen article, generated by backend and styled differently from other links by clients.

is_premium.description: Determines usage of premium primary color or not

usermix_display.description: When false, hide this section in the usermix view.

newsmix_display.description: When false, hide this section in the newsmix view.

Changes.description: All metadata about changes made to this document, as well as readable strings

TitleVignette.description: A string to show before the title value, styled as Primary or Primary Premium.

separator.description: The string to show between the vignette and title value.

text.description: Optional description. Only used by "supertags" (e.g. in StoryVignette)

value.description: The raw text, without any styles

markup.description: Styles etc to apply to the text

Vignette.description: A vignette is a ball followed by a text. The ball may have a color, and the text may have a color.

Color.description: A color consists of R, G, and B

Point.description: A point on a map expressed as WGS84 latitude/longitude.

Decoration.description: A set of colors to decorate the teaser
